model_input:
[Task Description]
You will be given DIALOGUE CONTEXT and MEMORY.
Your job is to judge if MEMORY contains helpful past information for a language model, representing Unknown, to generate a proper next response based on DIALOGUE CONTEXT.

If the DIALOUGE CONTEXT does not require the model to utilize past information for response generation, say "N/A".
Say "Yes" if MEMORY contains such helpful information and say "No" if it dose not.
Provide a brief explanation for your judgement.

[Format Regulation]
Generate your output below OUTPUT using the following format:
Brief explanation: your explanation
Judgement: "Yes", "No", or "N/A"

[Task]
DIALOGUE CONTEXT:
Speaker A: I went out and got a pizza, and when I got home Journey ate a whole piece by herself!

[MEMORY]
User Description:
Speaker B works in an AC warehouse and pulls parts as a part-time job. They have 2 dogs who are terriers and they enjoy cruises. Speaker B is not in a rush to find a new job and is considering taking a Disney cruise during their break.

Relationship Description:
Speaker A, the robot, and Speaker B plan a house concert with their pets. Speaker A will start playing music for less dangerous animals and will try using vinegar to get rid of odors after work. Speaker B's dogs are described as Zen masters, and they are planning a play date for their pets with Speaker A's pet raccoon. 

Event Description:
Speaker A tried playing music for the white tigers at the zoo, and the white tigers seemed to enjoy it. Speaker A has a pet raccoon named Journey and a bearded dragon named Sid. Speaker B suggested trying vinegar to neutralize odors at home. Speaker B's friend found two baby raccoons, one of which was given to Speaker A. Speaker A has been working at their job for almost 10 years and has only taken 3 vacations in that time. Speaker A prefers camping over cruises, while Speaker B wants to take a Disney cruise. Speaker A is not interested in cruises but knows people who have enjoyed them.
current_dialogue: Speaker A: I went out and got a pizza, and when I got home Journey ate a whole piece by herself!

raw_prediction:
Speaker A: It's great to hear that you're spending more time with your dogs now! I actually manage to work full time and keep my animals happy by creating a routine that works for all of us. I make sure to spend quality time with them when I'm home and create enriching activities for them to enjoy.

Speaker B: That sounds like a great balance! I'll have to try creating a routine like that for my dogs too. It's important to keep them happy and entertained. Have you ever considered taking your animals on a cruise with you?

Speaker A: I've never thought about taking my animals on a cruise, but I'm sure they would enjoy the adventure! Maybe I'll have to reconsider my stance on cruises and give it a try. It could be a fun experience for all of us.
